info.caption: image_1
info.description: <font face="Tahoma" color="#FFFFFF" size="14">賽夏族頭目帽:節慶祭典時頭目佩戴，是權力與地位的象徵</font>

info.caption: image_2
info.description: <font face="Tahoma" color="#FFFFFF" size="14">賽夏族警鈴:使用時邊跑邊搖動鐵環，讓鈴聲來昭告族人合力解決所發生的問題</font>

info.description: <font face="Tahoma" color="#FFFFFF" size="14">賽夏族煙草盒:放置菸草用</font>

info.caption: image_4
info.description: <font face="Tahoma" color="#FFFFFF" size="14">賽夏族木碗:婉</font>

info.description: <font face="Tahoma" color="#FFFFFF" size="14">賽夏族傳統女服飾:服飾</font>

info.caption: image_6
info.description: <font face="Tahoma" color="#FFFFFF" size="14">賽夏族房舍:族人所居住之屋舍</font>

info.caption: image_7
info.description: <font face="Tahoma" color="#FFFFFF" size="14">卑南族女子胸兜:傳統女子胸前裝飾用品</font>

info.caption: image_8
info.description: <font face="Tahoma" color="#FFFFFF" size="14">卑南族卑南族女性服飾:女用貼胸衣飾，作為今日女性胸罩</font>

info.caption: image_11
info.description: <font face="Tahoma" color="#FFFFFF" size="14">卑南族頭目珠繡長袖短上衣:頭目用卑南族，象徵地位與權力</font>

info.caption: image_12
info.description: <font face="Tahoma" color="#FFFFFF" size="14">卑南族男子頸鍊:頸鍊</font>

info.caption: image_13
info.description: <font face="Tahoma" color="#FFFFFF" size="14">卑南族頭飾:頭飾</font>

info.caption: image_14
info.description: <font face="Tahoma" color="#FFFFFF" size="14">卑南族腰飾:族人盛裝時用腰飾女子短上衣、圍裙:一般女子所穿戴</font>

info.caption: image_15
info.description: <font face="Tahoma" color="#FFFFFF" size="14">卑南族汲水葫蘆筒:盛水用</font>

info.caption: image_16
info.description: <font face="Tahoma" color="#FFFFFF" size="14">卑南族置物盤:裝置物品用</font>

info.caption: image_17
info.description: <font face="Tahoma" color="#FFFFFF" size="14">卑南族祭器:祭祀所使用煙草盒:放置菸草用</font>

info.caption: image_18
info.description: <font face="Tahoma" color="#FFFFFF" size="14">卑南族竹簍:容器、裝檳榔果及香煙敬客用</font>

info.caption: image_19
info.description: <font face="Tahoma" color="#FFFFFF" size="14">卑南族藤簍:容器、女紅針線藍</font>

info.caption: image_20
info.description: <font face="Tahoma" color="#FFFFFF" size="14">卑南族土礱:農事用。去殼皮用具</font>

info.caption: image_21
info.description: <font face="Tahoma" color="#FFFFFF" size="14">卑南族木臼:特有形製木臼，專用於搗打麻糬一般米糧</font>

info.caption: image_22
info.description: <font face="Tahoma" color="#FFFFFF" size="14">卑南族屋舍:族人所居住之房舍</font>

info.caption: image_23
info.description: <font face="Tahoma" color="#FFFFFF" size="14">葛瑪蘭族土拖:農具。水田整平</font>

info.caption: image_24
info.description: <font face="Tahoma" color="#FFFFFF" size="14">葛瑪蘭族連枷:米糧脫粒，脫殼用具</font>

info.caption: image_25

info.caption: image_26

info.description: <font face="Tahoma" color="#FFFFFF" size="14">葛瑪蘭族魚槍:水中打魚用具魚叉:捕魚用具</font>

info.caption: image_28
info.description: <font face="Tahoma" color="#FFFFFF" size="14">葛瑪蘭族網具:漁具。淺水溪池裡撈魚蝦用器具</font>

info.caption: image_29
info.description: <font face="Tahoma" color="#FFFFFF" size="14">葛瑪蘭族捺鑽:木工鑽洞工具</font>

info.caption: image_30
info.description: <font face="Tahoma" color="#FFFFFF" size="14">葛瑪蘭族墨斗:木工施工劃線工具</font>

info.caption: image_31
info.description: <font face="Tahoma" color="#FFFFFF" size="14">葛瑪蘭族竹罐:裝菸絲用具</font>

info.caption: image_32
info.description: <font face="Tahoma" color="#FFFFFF" size="14">葛瑪蘭族耳飾:飾品婦女盛裝時佩戴手鐲:飾品婦女盛裝時佩戴</font>

info.caption: image_33
info.description: <font face="Tahoma" color="#FFFFFF" size="14">葛瑪蘭族腕飾:飾品盛裝時繫於雙手腕部足飾:飾品盛裝時繫於足脛處</font>
